text: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2 is a 2013 computer animated movie made by Sony Pictures Animation. It stars Bill Hader, Anna Faris, James Caan, Andy Samberg, Neil Patrick Harris, and Benjamin Bratt. It is the sequel to Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs. ==Notes== Original Arranegd By: ALASTAIR KING Scoring Conducted By: ALASTAIR KING Recording Location: HENRY WOOD HALL, London UK == References == Category:2010s sequel movies Category:2013 computer-animated movies Category:2013 comedy movies Category:2013 science fiction movies Category:2013 3D movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American animated movies Category:Computer-animated movies Category:Movies set in California Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Sony Pictures Animation movies
title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
